content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property between the parties involved the movable property involved was a citroen c4 picasso vehicle and the immovable property was related to leasing agreements and debt obligations the court dissolved the marriage and ordered the defendant to fulfill the obligations of the leasing agreement the defendant was granted personal ownership of the vehicle the court also ordered the defendant to pay the applicant compensation and a debt the court referred to several articles of the civil code related to matrimonial property the applicant brought a legal action against the defendant to dissolve their marriage and requested various orders the defendant partially accepted some claims and filed a counterclaim the court will decide on the division of matrimonial property and other issues the court determined the ownership and use of the vehicle as well as the repayment of a loan made between the parties the court also addressed joint credit obligations and determined the responsible party for paying the costs of the proceedings the court approved the dissolution of the marriage the defendant was ordered to pay the applicant compensation and a debt the court recognized joint obligations between the parties towards different financial institutions the defendant was also ordered to pay costs and fees lastly there was a mention of an order for periodic maintenance enforcement
